title: Essential Troubleshooting Tools
content:
Command Line Tools:

ping:
• Test basic connectivity
• Measure round-trip time
• Identify packet loss
• Commands: `ping -c 4 192.168.1.1`

traceroute/tracert:
• Map path to destination
• Identify routing issues
• Locate network bottlenecks
• Commands: `traceroute google.com`

nslookup/dig:
• DNS query testing
• Resolve domain names
• Verify DNS configuration
• Commands: `nslookup google.com`

netstat:
• Display network connections
• Show listening ports
• View routing tables
• Commands: `netstat -an`

Protocol Analyzers:

Wireshark:
• Capture and analyze packets
• Filter traffic by protocol
• Decode protocol headers
• Performance analysis

tcpdump:
• Command-line packet capture
• Real-time traffic monitoring
• Scriptable for automation
• Lightweight alternative

Network Monitoring Tools:
• SNMP: Simple Network Management Protocol
• PRTG: Paessler Router Traffic Grapher
• SolarWinds: Network Performance Monitor
• Nagios: Open-source monitoring
